channel.title: How To Start A Server On A Mac!
channel.description:
To start a server on a mac you will need:
A 317 server (currently 317 Only)
Search Mac Client And Download Haxors Client!
~~~~~~Steps~~~~~~~
Ok open a terminal window (go to the magnifying glass in the top right corner of the screen and click it and search terminal)
Move you server to your desktop.
In terminal type "cd /Users/YOURUSERNAME/Desktop/Server"
With Out The " And replace your username with your username
For Example cd /Users/John/Desktop
And then click enter.
Then type java server
Then click enter.
Congratulations You have A Newly Mac Hosted Server!
Credits:
Me: 99%
Haxor: 1%
